content: circumference approx 50 cm / 19 3/4 width approx 13 cm / 5 1/8 materials drops silke-alpaca from garnstudio 150 g color no 6208 light blue grey 100 g color no 6230 grey blue or use drops nepal from garnstudio 150 g colour no 6220 medium blue 100 g colour no 6790 royal blue drops crochet hook size 6 mm / us j/10 or the crochet hook size needed to obtain correct crochet gauge
